@荷兰人
  • 一
  • 二
  • 三

一

Squat
Leg press
Leg extensions
Single arm dumbbell rows downstairs
Dragon flags

汉字
1. Squat:
深蹲 (shēn dūn)
- 深 (shēn) - Deep
- 蹲 (dūn) - Squat

2. Leg press:
腿部推举 (tuǐ bù tuī jǔ)
- 腿部 (tuǐ bù) - Legs
- 推举 (tuī jǔ) - Push and lift

3. Leg extensions:
腿部伸展 (tuǐ bù shēn zhǎn)
- 腿部 (tuǐ bù) - Legs
- 伸展 (shēn zhǎn) - Extend and stretch

4. Single arm cable rows:
单臂拉力器划船 (dān bì lā lì qì huá chuán)
- 单臂 (dān bì) - Single arm
- 拉力器 (lā lì qì) - Cable machine
(哑铃 (yǎ líng) - Dumbbell)
- 划船 (huá chuán) - Rowing

5. Dragon flag:
龙旗 (lóng qí)
- 龙 (lóng) - Dragon
- 旗 (qí) - Flag (in this context, referring to a gymnastics move where the body is held straight and horizontal while supported by the hands on a pole or other apparatus)
一
Week I
Squat 120kg 5x8
Leg press 100kg 2x15
Leg extensions 25kg 2x12
Single arm dumbbell rows downstairs 35kg 2x10
Dragon flags 2x8

二

Bench Incline bench press Dumbbell military press Cable chest flys Tricep pushdown Dumbbell lateral raises Bench Military press Lat pulldown downstairs Hammer grip pullups Arms superset: Tricep rope + bicep rope Dumbbell reverse flyes

三

Deadlift Bent over row Lat pulldown T-bar rows Ez bar curls Alternating dumbbell curls Deadlift (paused) Deadlift (block) Seated leg curls Hanging leg raises

四

Bench press Military press Incline bench dumbbell row Ez bar skullcrushers Ez bar upright row Single arm cable pushdown Squat Squat ssb squat Back raises/ extension Calf raises

五

Squat Romanian deadlift Single leg leg press Seated cable rows Dumbbell romanian deadlift Lying leg curls Bench Bench (elastic bands) Military press Side raises T-bar rows Arms superset
